summary: This is a modification of the Help Menu, pertaining specifically to Alchemy. The menu has been edited so as to include “Effects” and list of ingredient combinations which produce them, effectively assisting any level of Alchemist to expand upon their abilities without searching endlessly for in-game recipes or having to pause, and search online
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]

[center][size=30]Informative Alchemy[/size][/center]
This is a modification of the Help Menu, pertaining specifically to Alchemy. The menu has been edited so as to include “Effects” and list of ingredient combinations which produce them, effectively assisting any level of Alchemist to expand upon their abilities without searching endlessly for in-game recipes or having to pause, and search online. One need only go to Menu/Help/Alchemy, and all of the information is right there.

[center][youtube]ptFbXb3stgc[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/drail3-banner-smaller.jpg?w=920[/img]

[center][b]~The 'Informative Series' thus far~[/b][/center]

[center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39326/?]Informative Alchemy[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52464/?]Informative Blacksmith[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52465/?]Informative Disease[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39397/?]Informative Training[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52544/?]Informative Enchanter[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39069/?]Informative Shrines[/url][/b][/center]
[center][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39093/?]Informative Standing Stones[/url][/b][/center]

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/test.png?w=920[/img]

Drail3 mods are light weight by design. This means that none of my mods will make your game lag or drop your fps. My mods are script free and have one goal, which is to assist you in making the most of your character development. The Informative Series is a set of mods that explain how Skyrim works in greater depth than Bethesda provided in the Help Menu or interactive objects. So far, the [i]Informative Series[/i] is composed of the following.

I thank you all very much for taking the time to view my mods. Please comment and endorse if you enjoy them. If you would like to use any of my mods as part of your own, you need only ask, and give me credit.

[img]http://interrogisticmethodologies.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/quote-divider1.png?w=917[/img]
author: Drail3
